heading: Security Software Developer Intern
description: Completed structured cybersecurity training modules based on ISCÂ² security frameworks, strengthening foundational knowledge in information security principles.
Gained hands-on exposure to AWS cloud and security services, focusing on core cloud concepts and security best practices.
Conducted practical experiments using Kali Linux and Wireshark to understand network traffic analysis and common security tools.
Performed penetration testing on a web application developed by Tech Advise, identifying potential vulnerabilities and security risks.
Participated in industry talks and discussions with the Cybersecurity Head of LMNTRIX (Singapore), gaining insight into real-world security operations and career practices.

heading: Front-End Developer
description: Attended front-end development workshops to strengthen core UI and web development skills.

Participated in multiple web development projects across different student organizations, primarily focusing on front-end development with Next.js, React, TypeScript, JavaScript, Tailwind CSS, and Git, while gaining foundational exposure to backend and database tools such as Node.js, Prisma, and SQL-based systems.
Collaborated closely with other developers to build and improve shared codebases.

heading: Computer Studies Cluster Ambassador
highlight_details: SAMAHAN Research and Development | September 2022 - May 2023
description: Collaborated with fellow ambassadors from different departments to support cross-functional initiatives and student-focused programs.
Conducted research and gathered insights aimed at improving school processes and student experiences.
Facilitated both individual and group interviews to collect feedback and qualitative data.
